content: जीवक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जीव् --णिच् ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Living, making a livelihood by, generating &c. {@--2@} One who lives a long time. --कः {@--1@} A living being. {@--2@} A servant. {@--3@} A Buddhist mendicant, any mendicant who lives by begging. {@--4@} A usurer. {@--5@} A snakecatcher. {@--6@} A tree. {@--7@} A medicinal plant of that name.
